
                            
                            <p>买的本站推荐的迎春，400G 三角洲 汇通，到货后基本傻瓜式安装。用送的TDS笔测了自来水，显示310，021这水质纯纯垃圾。再测了一瓶康师傅，显示19。最后是过滤后的水，显示9。不过每次开了都得先放一会儿水，不然显示30左右。 <br> 总的来说还不错。 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/213601tjhcbvwztyh2hc4z.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/213601tjhcbvwztyh2hc4z.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/213623n5igjh8wk8eep7nh.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/213623n5igjh8wk8eep7nh.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/213636czvize3z166kk4vl.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/213636czvize3z166kk4vl.jpg"> <br>  </p>
                            <p>
                                
                            </p>

                                    <i class="fa fa-star-o"></i> 加入收藏</a>
                            </p>
